nodes.bodyText: Isn't this the same thing as line 178?

@brucean52 if I have both entityName and jobId then only I am setting latestJobFacet, In the other scenario we are only checking for jobId, if that condition can be changed to include entityName too then i can remove this condition.
Yeah, it can be changed in the future.

For my tests that follow in DHFPROD-5047, I need an await before wait, so:
await wait(() => {
